service.name: /mgif109.mg
service.query: SELECT GIFT_TYPE_CD AS CODE , GIFT_TYPE_NAME FROM MSS.MG_GIFTTPMST WHERE GIFT_TYPE_FLAG = '01' ORDER BY GIFT_TYPE_CD

WITH T_REQ AS ( SELECT REQ_DT , STR_CD , REQ_SLIP_NO , SUM(REQ_QTY) AS REQ_QTY , SUM(REQ_AMT) AS REQ_AMT FROM ( SELECT REQ_DT , STR_CD , REQ_SLIP_NO , REQ_QTY , REQ_QTY * GIFTCERT_AMT AS REQ_AMT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTISSUEREQ A , MSS.MG_GIFTAMTMST B WHERE A.GIFT_TYPE_CD = B.GIFT_TYPE_CD AND A.ISSUE_TYPE = B.ISSUE_TYPE AND A.GIFT_AMT_TYPE = B.GIFT_AMT_TYPE AND A.REQ_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.GIFT_TYPE_CD LIKE ? || '%' ) GROUP BY REQ_DT, STR_CD, REQ_SLIP_NO), T_IN AS ( SELECT REQ_DT , STR_CD , REQ_SLIP_NO , SUM(IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY , SUM(IN_AMT) AS IN_AMT FROM ( SELECT REQ_DT , STR_CD , REQ_SLIP_NO , IN_QTY , IN_QTY * GIFTCERT_AMT AS IN_AMT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTISSUEIN A , MSS.MG_GIFTAMTMST B WHERE A.GIFT_TYPE_CD = B.GIFT_TYPE_CD AND A.ISSUE_TYPE = B.ISSUE_TYPE AND A.GIFT_AMT_TYPE = B.GIFT_AMT_TYPE ) GROUP BY REQ_DT, STR_CD, REQ_SLIP_NO)
SELECT A.REQ_DT , A.STR_CD , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(A.STR_CD) AS STR_NM , A.REQ_SLIP_NO , A.REQ_QTY , A.REQ_AMT , B.IN_QTY , B.IN_AMT FROM T_REQ A LEFT OUTER JOIN T_IN B ON A.REQ_DT= B.REQ_DT AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.REQ_SLIP_NO = B.REQ_SLIP_NO ORDER BY A.REQ_DT, A.REQ_SLIP_NO, A.STR_CD

SELECT STR_CD , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(STR_CD) AS STR_NAME , IN_DT , IN_SLIP_NO , A.GIFT_TYPE_CD , GIFT_TYPE_NAME , A.GIFT_AMT_TYPE , GIFT_AMT_NAME , GIFTCERT_AMT , IN_QTY , GIFT_S_NO , GIFT_E_NO , IN_QTY * GIFTCERT_AMT AS TOT_AMT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTISSUEIN A , MSS.MG_GIFTTPMST B , MSS.MG_GIFTAMTMST C WHERE A.GIFT_TYPE_CD = B.GIFT_TYPE_CD AND A.GIFT_TYPE_CD = C.GIFT_TYPE_CD AND A.ISSUE_TYPE = C. ISSUE_TYPE AND A.GIFT_AMT_TYPE = C.GIFT_AMT_TYPE AND REQ_DT = ? AND STR_CD = ? AND REQ_SLIP_NO = ? AND A.GIFT_TYPE_CD LIKE ? || '%' ORDER BY STR_CD, IN_DT, IN_SLIP_NO, A.GIFT_TYPE_CD , A.GIFT_AMT_TYPE

SELECT SUM(REQ_CNT) AS REQ_CNT , SUM(IN_CNT) AS IN_CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT , 0 AS IN_CNT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTREQ A WHERE GIFTCARD_NO = ? AND GIFT_AMT_TYPE = ? AND GIFT_TYPE_CD = ? AND ISSUE_TYPE = ? UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS REQ_CNT , COUNT(*) AS IN_CNT FROM MSS.MG_GIFTMST WHERE GIFTCARD_NO = ?)
